data.prayer: Father, help the 72 believers in Le Kef to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Le Kef, Tunisia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 72 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 72 believers in the state of Le Kef.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Le Kef to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Deaf people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, help every believer in Le Kef, Tunisia be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Le Kef, Tunisia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.section_summary:
the state of Le Kef, Tunisia has a population of 243,200.

We estimate Le Kef has 72 people who might know Jesus, 1,019 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 242,108 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3,377 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Le Kef, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
